page.title: 10A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: SATURDAY LONG LIE TILL 10.45am.DAD WENT GOLFING AT 8am.MUM DID HOUSEWORK.HAD BREAKFAST(LEMON TEA)THEN WATCHED T.V. DAD BACK FOR FAMILY LUNCH AT 1.30.THEN FAMILY MOTORED TO PERTH TO FIND A WEDDING PRESENT FOR MY COUSIN HEATHER.I BOUGHT A NEW CRICKET BAT AND BALL.ARRIVED HOME AT 6.00pm HAD DINNER THEN PAUL,MY LITTLE BROTHER AND I WENT TO PLAY CRICKET IN THE BACK GARDEN. THEN WATCHED T.V.TILL BED(11.30) SUNDAY ROSE AT 9.45am.AFTER BREAKFAST MUM AND PAUL WENT TO CHURCH AND I WATCHED A VIDEO.AFTER LUNCH WE WENT TO VISIT GRAN IN COALTOWN OF BALGONIE, CAME BACK FOR DINNER AT 6.00pm,THEN NEIGHBOURS JANICE AND JOHN VISITED US UNTIL 11.00pm, THEN BED.
